name: Bullet Hell (Tolo)
description:
This game was originally made for Yglise, my belovied giftee. In the Secret Santa Jam 2022.

In this game you shoot turrets with your big gun. The goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. To your disposal, you have different powerups and your incredible dodging skills. Good luck, and have fun!

Controls:

Move: WASD

Select: Space

Shoot: Left mouse button
